events.name: Global BCI Race Heats Up as China Unveils New Policies to Accelerate Brain-Tech in Healthcare
events.description: China has unveiled new policies to accelerate the development and adoption of brain-computer interface technology for medical purposes.

events.name: Megaplatanos: The Greek Roswell
events.description:
Megaplatanos is a small village situated an hour and a half drive just outside the city of Athens, Greece. Like most Greek villages, it is home to mainly shepherds and farmers that toil in the fields and mountains from dawn to dusk. On September 2nd, 1990, around 9 at night, half a dozen strange lights

The post Megaplatanos: The Greek Roswell appeared first on Ghost Theory.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Million, Madison County - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious history of Million, a town in Madison County that has been shrouded in secrecy for decades. Discover the remnants of an alleged UFO hotspot and learn about the events surrounding China's recent unveiling of new policies to accelerate brain-tech in healthcare.
